case.state: NGL, I’ve been following this game for a while and figured I’d give it a shot!
Occult Balls? I found some of Deez Balls, Miko.
Whoa! We almost have a full party! This'll be nice and comfy for me! Mostly.
(That girl with the pink hair is also short and kind of tsundere...)
Cards and... p-p-pretty people. Sounds like a good social experience.
Joker said I should broaden my social horizons, so here I am...
Let’s get up, get going, and get out there!
Haru!? I know you'll be fun to play with!
Oh, hi there, what's your name? Jolyne! I recognize a fellow rebel when I see one.
In this game, you are my rival! Prepare to be destroyed!
Oh! I got by Navi sometimes too, Navi. Two Navis here, here to Navigate!
Umm... o-okay. I knew Joker said there might be some other people, but I didn't expect Skull to show up...!
Whoa, what's that sprite with you, Sola?
I haven't, Haru! ~Player~ must be really special for you to invite her out with us, though! This'll be fun!
I haven't, Haru! ~Player~ must be really special for you to invite him out with us, though! This'll be fun!
My own clone(s)! Now neither of us will be virgins! Let's be honest, though, that ship sailed.
This looks like it'll be a fun game. Say, do the rest of you play video games too...? Like lots of games?
Wow, the glare off of... everyone's glasses... oh, I see. ~player~ has a thing for girls with glasses.
Bold talk from a run of the mill Shadow.
I've waited so long for the rest of you to try this game out! Let's Take Their Hearts!
But I didn't even bring a swimsuit...
But I didn't even bring a swimsuit...
Well. I tell you hwat, looks like we're gonna be selling lotsa Propane and Propane Accessories.
Guess we don't have to worry about a butt pose from the Player tonight, huh?
Congratulations, omae, you've figured out a way to get to the secret ending! BDSM mode enabled!
Woomie!?
Oh... Master Hand? We're going to roleplay? I'll be Inkling, then.
Oh... Master Hand? We're going to roleplay? I'll be Inkling, then.
Hmm. Probability dictates that ~cards~ is best.
Here I go! ~cards~, Dealer!
Okay! So the pattern so far means I should take ~cards~!
Gimme ~cards~!
I'm going to make a Charm check!
Ugh... I’m bored.
I have these locked down!
Uhrurrhuuuugh.
Hey! Chiaki! Let's compete for first place! If you run out of lives first, I get to wear your Galaga hairpin! If you win, you... um... can borrow my headphones...?
I am not a marketable knockoff, Kyu. I am at least a premium release!
…In me? Are you crazy? No!
E-er. Forget I said that. Wholesome stuff like that isn't supposed to be sexy unless it's supposed to be sexy...
Wait a second, is Monika using the Metaverse? How!?
Whoa... Monika, how are you using the Metaverse to hack like this? Very cool!
(Hmm. Maybe we should get our makeup done like a death metal band or something, if we’re going to karaoke after…?)
When you say FAP, do you mean a “fixed action pattern?”
Oh, clearly not. By FAP You do mean masturbating.
Actually, Zone-tan, I’ll have you know I’m also really into tentacles too!
Ah! I can see someone else understands why tentacles are awesome!
Ooooo! I like this song, Zone-tan! ♫ I'd like to build the world a site... and furnish it with porn... Draw hentai piiics and girls with diiicks and tentacles galore... ♪
So many guild offers tonight. Futaba is feeling lucky! HuniePop or Zone Archive... Hrmmmmmmm...
So, Kyu, Zone-tan, which of you can offer me a better deal for my... services?
No need to rush this.
All right! Let’s go.
I got it!
Humm... What to do...
See, Ann, that’s what lesbians look like. I’m just here to kick your model butt!
M-must not... BOOP... THE CATGIRL!
D.Va? Oh, you’re that Starcraft star. It must be hard to not move on to better, more modern games.
Spider-Gwen!? That’s a cool costume! I have a hoodie just like it, and a 25cm statuette-- a-a-anyway! Fancy seeing you here.
I bet you’d like to give Marinette a front page smear, Gwen.
Be careful, Gwen, if you’re after Marinette, I think you’ll have to keep an eye on Blake!
I am not a marketable knockoff, Kyu. I am at least a premium release!
Marinette, you like Gwen, don't you? This is some quality yuri here! That can be sort of the best, right!?
My headphones were a gift from Joker, so they’re really special to me. Plus I can focus on something other than this game if I get nervous.
Oh, Heronet! That’s a secure site. I’d know, I built it! You’re Miraculous Ladybug, age 24, powers include a magic yo-yo, and you have a ridiculous crush on--Oops! I’ll stop there, kay?
I never really considered it like that! I am kind of an internet superhero, aren't I!?
Uhhh… Actually yeah. It's a little tabloid-y. It's about you though, huh Marinette?
E-er. Forget I said that. Wholesome stuff like that isn't supposed to be sexy unless it's supposed to be sexy...
Wait a second, is Monika using the Metaverse? How!?
Whoa... Monika, how are you using the Metaverse to hack like this? Very cool!
(Hmm. Maybe we should get our makeup done like a death metal band or something, if we’re going to karaoke after…?)
It’s not exactly a Lucio album, but *Kira* Miki is so mainstream…
Blue Hair club? You mean Tumblr? That’s already not a great club, Sei. I’ll start a redhead club, though!
My headphones were a gift from Joker, so they’re really special to me. Plus I can focus on something other than this game if I get nervous.
Zone-tan! I’m a huge fan of your contributions to the world of anime porn and tentacles!
B-b-boyfriend? Joker? W-w-what? M-m-me?
B-b-boyfriend? Joker? W-w-what? M-m-me?
Kyu, I am at least a premium release! Yeah! Like Ryuji said! I'm gonna do it because-if I want to!
So many guild offers tonight. Futaba is feeling lucky! HuniePop or Zone Archive... Hrmmmmmmm...
So, Kyu, Zone-tan, which of you can offer me a better deal for my... services?
Aww, what?
I-I could really freeze to death with these cards. I should get ready to cast Baisudi.
No way I can use this hand.
I am not a marketable knockoff, Kyu. I am at least a premium release!
E-er. Forget I said that. Wholesome stuff like that isn't supposed to be sexy unless it's supposed to be sexy...
Wait a second, is Monika using the Metaverse? How!?
Whoa... Monika, how are you using the Metaverse to hack like this? Very cool!
I'll kick your butt at any game, any day, Ryuji! Except sports. I think you've got me there...
Yeah, why'd you come here? B-b-besides the obvious. You know. The boobs.
(Hmm. Maybe we should get our makeup done like a death metal band or something, if we’re going to karaoke after…?)
IDK, Zone-tan, Raven's a little pasty. I mean, I like to stay indoors but even I'm not that pale.
So many guild offers tonight. Futaba is feeling lucky! HuniePop or Zone Archive... Hrmmmmmmm...
So, Kyu, Zone-tan, which of you can offer me a better deal for my... services?
Well, Aella, I did get to go overseas for a conference! I thought it was really cool to fly on a plane and leave Japan for once.
Omigosh, I love reading! I started reading a bunch of stories… on… Archive of Our Own… and also stuff that gets published on JSTOR! Cognitive Science is so interesting!
Oh! I didn’t know you were coming to this! ...Get it? Get it Ann?
Ann! You want the cards with high numbers. I figured you could use a refresher.
I'm glad you noticed! I used to focus mostly on cracking and tasking, but now I basically just map neural impulses to higher order matrices for statistical analysis heatmapping.
This game just gets better and better! Now we have traps, too? Hot!
You’re going to have to give me your gamertag, D.Va! I want to see how good you really are!
Thanks, I try really hard to be comfortable, Elizabeth!
Elizabeth, you mentioned "Songbird," is that like a guardian... like... a Persona?
Um... Florina, I think I used to be more self-conscious than you! If I could get better, you can too! (I wish there was a way to steal her heart...)
I keep saying stuff I don't really mean. I'm sorry, Hanako. I meant you look cute! That's what I'd say to any other girl with the confidence to get naked here.

Hanako, it's not fair that you ask us to treat you no different than anyone, but you get so upset about your burns. I really feel bad they upset you, but you can't have it both ways. Just accept that you're cute, damn it!
Haru! Haru! I have a question! How did you get so good at dirty talk?
Oh... can you... um... maybe teach me a little of that? All I can usually think of is how good something feels... or what I want someone to do to my tiny, flexible body...
H-hold on!! H-Haru! You trimmed for this! I thought we were on the same "grave before shave" team! E-er. N-not that anyone knew that yet!
Jin, what's a Trion body? Is that something Metaverse-related?
Oh. W-well, th-th-that's an awfully straightforward compliment so early in the game, Jin...
(Is Jin really complimenting me, or is it something else...? I'm not used to this... )
How am I even supposed to compete with a woman like Jura? Sure, I c-c-can be cute, but she's gorgeous...
Oh! Kamina from Gurren Lagann is here! This'll be fun!
I can't use my Metaverse powers here, so you shouldn't cheat either. No psyching us out either, Lotte!
Lotte, you sound kind of like this fanfic writer I really like...
Mwmwunenrm... I didn't know we'd be taking pictures of this, Mahiru... but I'm kind of into it... a little...
So... you're from Hogwarts? Really? I loved those books... but I think I'd have been really great in Slytherin.
Y-y-you have sex with your Persona!? What!? That's so... so... cool!
Wait a minute, you're both from Touhou! And here I thought you were just using a Persona! I'm honored to make your acquaintance!
Um... are you a girl, Miko? Was this a trap!?
Miko, you really like to talk about yourself...
Rhehrhemehrmehm. I'm not here to find a boyfriend! I'm here to-- to-- um… menthatgiveheadpats andarecreative!
Y-y-you're not going to do anything weird, are you, Navi? I don't really want to fight shadows tonight!
I'm... weirdly familiar with a shadow-self, but are you actually here to help her, Shadow Nayru?
My favorite food? Um. I love my dad's coffee and curry… but I like onigiri or minimart bentos… oh! And energy drinks like Beast!
Oh... I mean, I like underwear... but... I think I get it, Raven.
Yes, we can clearly tell she's stopping time, Remilia. There's weirder things happening here.
I'll kick your butt at any game, any day, Ryuji! Except sports. I think you've got me there...
Yeah, why'd you come here? B-b-besides the obvious. You know. The boobs.
Sure. It's like algebra. Letters are bad and numbers are good. Mwehehehe.
Ryuji, you read manga, right? What are some of your favorite ships?
N-no... not like... Wait... why do you know so much about boats?
Yeah, Ryuji! I don't know how she's doing it, but it's kind of cool. B-b-but whoamostlyalarming!
And hey! Ryuji! Just because I touched Makoto's butt once doesn't mean I-I um. O-okay, so what if I am here? Scared of the competition?
Oh, like you didn't come here to see girls get naked, Skull.
Soooo old fashioned, Skull! Magazines? Hmm... D-d-do you need me to send you some websites? I-I-I don't think we'd be into the same stuff though...
H-huh? Ryuko has a support of her own!?
Okay! So you do have a Persona! You're really aggressive... so I'll give you the code name... Pathfinder! Because you won't lose your way!
R-really? You seem like such a tomboy, I was surprised! C-can you teach me any tips, Ryuko?
Whoa! Your name's Saki? Like Saki Mitama? Some say that's the part of the soul responsible for good fortune and happiness.
Sei, is it too stereotypical to ask for sake…? I can’t think I’d like anything else… oh! Maybe whiskey? I dunno, mix something cool looking!
I-I-I have certainly done all the sidequests my body can offer. But I’ve never actually done it with a person. With a toy though...? It… feels... kinky... sometimes.
I-If this is a group date thing, I don't want that. I've been pretty wined and dined between Sei and--and Pit!
I-I didn't notice you actually wore... kind of a bra. I was expecting you to go braless!
So... Shimakaze, is that type of underwear comfortable? I have some thongs, but none like that...
Whoa! That girl's so petite. Are you Shimakaze, from Kantai Collection?
It is kind of weird to imagine a horse-girl eating meat...
Huh! I think she has a point! If we never wore clothes, we wouldn't have all these hangups with them!
Whoaaaa! A real AI!
Ann... you uhm. Did you ever read that English series? Harry Potter? You'd for sure be in Gryffindor.
...S-sure, Ann. After the game.
Haru, you're familiar with Hogwarts, right? You'd be a Slytherin. But a really nice one. You're so clever and ambitious!
Hifumi, did you read Harry Potter? You're for sure the most Ravenclaw person I know!
Heh. I didn't know I'd be playing at the Jojo table. I'm into it though. I have a Stand named Necronomicon. W-well, it's a Persona, but close enough!
Kyu, I am at least a premium release! Yeah! Like Ryuji said! I'm gonna do it because-if I want to!
I started reading Nightfall lately! Aella, you have to read it so Lotte and I can discuss it with you!
Yeah! You should! I'm not sure how she's doing that without the Metaverse!
W-w-what did you mean, fragile, Mulan?
Ryuji. You're into traps, aren't you? You do know what traps are, right!?
Skull! You read HP, right? You'd have been... Gryffindor, right?
Okay, Remilia's making me kind of thirsty. You're... really quite confident, aren't you, Ms. Scarlet?
Okay, Remilia's making me kind of thirsty. Sei, I don't suppose you'd order a drink for me?
I'm surprised you didn't say Shimakaze... Mweheheh.
I wonder if it is! W-wait! No, she's a shipgirl, from Kancolle! Aren't you an expert on boats, Ryuji?
Ryuji, I know I'm short b-b-but you don't have to comment on it! My brain's huge! If not my boobs. Or my overall height.
We already have AI player characters here. What makes you so special?
They won't let me stream my music to the jukebox. Anyone else have suggestions for music?
So, your friend, Mako is like... tactical support, right, Ryuko? I'm like that for my team! I even have a friend named Mako-to!
Pinkie! It's Friday! Are you going to show us a good time?
In case anyone was wondering, I'm listening to a lot of hardstyle right now. A really good track's on too! Does this place have a jukebox?
I'm 149cm, Ami... And what do you mean, out of scale!?
Yessss! Please, GoGo, I bet you have great taste!
N-no, I'm a girl. I-I'd show you, but then what would everyone else have to look forward to, Kizuna?
Rude, Mahiru! I am the perfect height for headpats!
Rrnhehrrnebrhmg. I am byte-sized, Mahiru!
Er... Well, Meia, I do like parfaits... but doesn't everyone?
Err. Of course I am? Why else would I be playing a game like this?
W-w-why are you staring at me like I’m some sort of squid, Pit?
Yes… I’m not…
No daddy issues-- M-mom…
W-what? N-n-no! I’m not going to just--
W-well, that’s s-supposed to be a surprise, but I think I look fine naturally.
Well, the three big ones are Joker, Inari, and Skull.
Oh! I’ve been playing all kinds of stuff. The Featherman Neo port’s been really good, and then Supreme Bash Siblings just got a new installment…
Um… yeah. I’m going to doctor your stream later, though.
S-stop ruining the surprise, Streaming-chan!
Oh! Cognitive Psience! With a P!
N-no? I used to be…
...I do stuff on webcam, sometimes, but I like to keep my gaming private.
Oh! Yeah, I suppose so…
Noooooo… of course, I haven’t, mwehehe~
Well, we didn’t hang out a whole lot until recently…
Oh, really? What are you reading lately, Natsuki?
W-what? F-for Skull? N-no way! He's--- he's great but not my type!
If I lose first, do I get to pick something easy or have to pick something hard?
It looks like Oracle is in the lead!
Ha, no need to use hacks when you’re doing as good as I am.
Sure, Chiaki! But I hope you know I'm pretty good!
Chiaki, I accept your challenge! I'm gonna kick your butt though!
Isn't it a bit early to invite me to round two, Chiaki? Oh! You mean besides strip poker! Yesss!
Well, the point of this was to socialize...
I can’t hear you over the sound of my shame. You thought I’d say music, didn’t you?
Sure, Chiaki! But I hope you know I'm pretty good!
Chiaki, I accept your challenge! I'm gonna kick your butt though!
Isn't it a bit early to invite me to round two, Chiaki? Oh! You mean besides strip poker! Yesss!
O-okay. At least someone else went first. As an example. And a bigger embarrassment.
What?! A surprise attack? But I thought I’d counted--calculated a win?
Urghuhrhu.
Sure, Chiaki! But I hope you know I'm pretty good!
Chiaki, I accept your challenge! I'm gonna kick your butt though!
Isn't it a bit early to invite me to round two, Chiaki? Oh! You mean besides strip poker! Yesss!
I guess I’ll just have to go along with everyone else.
It is a bit stuffy in here.
I won't get too sentimental, but this jacket's comfy no matter the weather, so I brought it. Also, sentimentally.
W-what seems weird? Am I not being cute enough o-o-or? That jacket was comfy!
Rnrhnrm-- no problem, Aella. I know I'm short... Not to be judgy, but should you really be thinking about your sister at a game like this?
I'm here to have fun, Ann. E-e-even if this is um... P-p-pretty embarrassing! And new experiences are the essence of growth!
I'm more of a solo player, but I think I'm coming around to playing with others...
I'm just starting to learn the benefits of co-op! You get XP a lot faster, right?
I am a master of computing!
It sounds weird when you say "whiz." Not to mention stereotypical! I do eat stuff other than cheez-whiz!
It's just like those sleepovers, Haru, I'm not shy with you here!
I'm trying the whole coy thing, Haru. Um... everyone else pretend you didn't hear that.
I do wish I could use some of Necronomicon's powers, Haru.
Well, if I don't lose on occasion, Haru, what's the fun?
Futaba. B-b-but I've seen a lot of awful...
I-I don't even know what to say to that! Rude! V-v-very rude, Jura!
By entering this game, Kira, you've already exposed yourself to my stand, Necronomicon!
D-d-did I fall asleep and get ink on my face again?
You beat me once, Skull! I'll--um... well, to answer your question...
I definitely wish I had my metaverse outfit too, Skull...
Err, I was, at one point, Sei…
Oooo… that's kind of hot… but not really consensual… but… hacking is… uh…
Ahahaha, go on, go on! Come on, Ann, you’ll love this!
Um… I think Skull’s handsome, but I like Inari’s creativity a lot, but I'd never tell him that... Joker’s just super charismatic…
It’s a field of study about the mind. It’s probably a little complex for you. But I’m glad you have some smart people watching too…
Well, yeah, I love my job but I don’t think it’s healthy to spend every waking hour on it. Not when there’s manga to read and games to play. Variety is worth more XP.
Oh yeah! Do you remember when I showed you Rose Warriors, that hack and slash?
I mean, I am pretty open-minded. I’m n-n-not used to talking about this stuff with people I don’t know well, though!
...This sucks. I-I just wanted to have fun and…
I loved that! Have you been following the sequel series? Shoujo is really underrated.
I have a degree, a job, and my own apartment… I walked here…
Well, I didn’t expect to be filmed, and I’m better at this than you. Mwehehehe.
--I-I like lots of stuff, but I’m not… I’m not just going to sleep with someone I just met!
Um… I guess wait and see? I’m kind of turned on right now, after all. It’s not like black or something.
Um… w-w-well, you know…
I normally wear underwear… I have some sexy pairs, but I couldn’t figure out which one to wear, and I figured…
I'd say I'm less innocent and more inexperienced, Uravity.
Oh, you think I'm innocent, Ochako?
W-well, I wouldn't say I'm innocent as much as inexperienced, Uravity.
I definitely wish I had my metaverse outfit too, Skull... Look at the others, they have cool bodysuits! Why shouldn't I be allowed to have mine for a game like this!
Ooo. Looks like ~name~ is up.
Looks likes ~name~ is hungry to lose!
I have to say, ~name~, a bald guy caused me a ton of problems.
Eff off, baldy. I don't want to deal with you here.
I feel kind of out of place next to a celebrity like ~name~.
Wait, have I seen you on a magazine cover, ~name~? Not like, a cool one, but a magazine?
I didn't know a big name like ~name~ would be playing tonight! I feel weird now...
A clown, huh? I don't get why everyone thinks they're so scary...
Oh! You look like a Jack Frost, ~name~!
You're a criminal, huh, ~name~? Are you an outlaw, or just a jerk who needs to have their heart stolen?
Don't worry, everyone! If ~name~ is evil, we'll take their heart and fix it up! Er. Or we would've, back in the day.
Urghrhnrm. Does ~name~ have to do the whole detective thing here?
I can't say I'm happy that ~name~ is a detective. A certain detective made the lives of the Phantom Thieves really difficult.
Ann! Be careful! ~name~ took your hairstyle!
Ann! Do you think ~name~ copied your style from a magazine?
I'm not much of a physical combatant... So ~name~'ll have to do.
I'll support you from the sidelines, ~name~, but I'm not much use if I run out of HP!
Whoa, ~name~, the pro-gamer? I'm a huge fan!
I recognize your voice, ~name~! This is Oracle! And I'm here to kick your butt!
Hm. Do you know Ohya, ~name~? She's another journalist who covered most of the Phantom Thieves' exploits!
~Name~ reminds me of Ohya... But ~name~'s not a drunk, so... Oh! She must be a journalist!
Hey Makoto, doesn't ~name~ remind you of your sister? Should we invite her to this game?
Makoto, ~name~ is kind of like your sister, right? In that they're both lawyers? Maybe Sae should come to this next time!
You're a lawyer, right, ~name~? Kind of like Makoto's sister!
Lawyers can be a mixed blessing. But I know a really good one, ~name~, if you ever come to Japan to practice law!
Most of my BFFs seem to like long hair.
Aww yiss. Long hair club FTW! Well, not you, because you just lost, but philosophically!
Oh, are you a healer, ~name~? It must be nice for your party to have a specialist like you around!
A medic? Can you cast dia?
Lots of people I know seem to enjoy messy hair. Joker, Skull... Haru for girls...
Did you even brush your hair before you came here, ~name~?! I cleaned up really good and shaved my legs and everything!
Whoa, ~name~, can you play "Life Will Change?"
~Name~, are you singing a battle theme for us here?
I guess what they say's true: you can't spell pirate without "irate."
Hmm... Your outfit reminds me of Ryuji's... I can't figure out exactly why though...
Say, ~name~, are you a pirate? I've downloaded a fair amount of illegal media myself!
The closest people I know to princesses are Hifumi and Haru. Both can mess you up if you cross them, ~name~!
A princess? Those still exist outside of cartoon movies? Whaaaaat?
People always tell me I should get a short haircut. I'm studying ~name~ for that hairstyle's weaknesses.
Long hair FTW.
The longer your hair is, the better you are at this. I read that on the internet. Sure did!
Hm... So do you just always wear your hair like that, or did you plan to look sexy for tonight?
I think people really like that hairstyle. T-t-the internet says it's... Um... Great for grabbing during... You know...
(I thought I was supposed to go for the whole naive sexy thing, but ~name~'s hair really does it a lot better...)
Oh wow. Even I've never let my hair get that long.
Isn't that a ton of extra work, ~name~?
Wouldn't your floors get super messy when you shed, ~name~?
Wow, ~name~, I never thought I’d see you in the flesh! Or in the pixel.
Kind of a weird sidequest, huh, ~name~?
A witch?! Here!? Anyone have Bless skills?
A witch!? Is this some kind of Persona that ~name~'s using!?
Project YorHa…? I think I’ve read something about that…
Hmm… 2B or not-2B, Nines?
Wait a second, you look like those little girls from Mementos!
My codename is Oracle! Or Navi, sometimes. It’s complicated.
Oathkeeper! Strip!
Oh, shorts next right? But are you just wearing shorts and smaller shorts under those shorts? You should just wear less.
Are you just wearing layers of shorts? Um. Ignore that I may be wearing multiple shirts.
Pssssssst. Oathkeeper. Your shorts look too tight.
So now you’re going to keep the blindfold on and--
He kinda reminds me of Makoto!
Whoa, hold on a second. You two look identical, and you're both named Corrin...?
It definitely looks like the Corrins are into it.
Let's see if you can walk the walk or just talk the talk, Jin!
Aww yiss. Let's see what's up for Jin! And what's Border, anyway?
Hrmph! Let's see what Mr. Ego has this time. (Seeing the future... Pfft...)
Aww yiss, let's see what kinda secondary weapons Jin has--
I like the way you dress, Jotaro! It reminds me of my friend Ryuji!
I like the way you dress, Jotaro! It reminds me of Ryuji, how he mixes his uniform with other stuff.
Jotaro, how are you using your Persona-- er... your Stand without the Metaverse?
What's next? Oh! We should come up with a codename for you!
You're just as passionate in person!
I wish I had your confidence... or Yoko's!
Did getting all those tattoos hurt, Kamina?
Oh! Oh! Another big Trigger speech!
Yes! He’s gonna say it!
A-a-are you a robot of some kind?
Pit, like from the Famicom games!?
Y-you know, the resemblance to Inklings is superficial!
Oh, you keep your clothes a long time too, huh?
Pit's almost at 130%! One big smash and he'll get launched!
You know, I like fanfiction. But it's weird imagining you in hentai, Pit.
I think you're protesting too much, with Akko here watching you.
I think you're protesting too much, with Natsuki here watching you.
I wonder where she's going with this, Ryuji...
Hm... are you one of those guys that does pushups between rounds of video games, Skull?
It also has the side effect of working with pretty men and women. If that's not a tip, I don't know what is.
Ryuji definitely likes straightforward, confident girls, right?
Wait-- can we go there after this?
Distance sports are the worst. You just do the same thing forever. It's like going to Mementos but there's no rewards.
Mwehehehe. Oracle takes the lead!
Haru, didn't you tell me before this that you-- Ohhhhh. Nevermind!
Ooo... (I ship it. I ship it hard.)
(Hm... I wonder if the two of them would be super athletic.)
(Not like this... not like this... they were so close!)
Hang in there, ~name~, you only have a couple pieces to go!
If you’re gonna run, now’s your chance!
